rooms.description: Open entrance with polished stone flooring.
Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the front facade for natural light and ventilation. Features a sectional sofa, open-plan design merging dining space.
Integrated within the living area for seamless family interaction.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with dining and living areas. Equipped with modern appliances and ample storage.
Spacious bedroom on ground floor facing east for positive energy as per Vastu principles. Includes built-in wardrobes.
Additional bedroom with north-facing orientation to promote calmness.
Modern en-suite bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom with Vastu-compliant placement for water elements.

openings.description: Main entrance door leading into the foyer, ensuring welcoming energy.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in living room and master bedroom for ample natural light, placed as per Vastu guidelines to enhance clarity.
Service door for utilities and emergency exits.
Designated poolside opening from living area with direct access to the swimming pool area on an adjacent landscaped terrace.
